long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MeibunClipper is a browser extension that lets you save interesting Japanese phrases you find on the web directly to your Meibun (https://meibun.xyz) account.

Features:
- Save Japanese text with just one click
- Two convenient ways to save:
1. Select text and use the right-click context menu
2. Click the extension icon to save content from the current page

How to use:
1. Find interesting Japanese text while browsing
2. Select the text you want to save
3. Either right-click and select "Save to Meibun" or click the extension icon
4. Review your saved sentences anytime on Meibun (https://meibun.xyz)

Perfect for:
• Japanese language learners
• Students preparing for JLPT
• Anyone interested in collecting authentic Japanese examples
• Meibun users looking to expand their study materials
